oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plant Research International of Wageningen UR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Plant Research International of Wageningen UR (PRI) combines a lengthy tradition in strategic research with a global outlook and next-generation standards of innovation. Research is combined with up-to-date business development. By integrating knowledge in the fields of genetics and reproduction, crop protection, crop ecology and agricultural systems, Plant Research International offers a host of fresh perspectives to industry, agriculture, horticulture, and agro-ecosystems linked to landscape and nature development. Contact person for organic agriculture research is Mrs. Greet Blom, head of the IBL (Innovation Centre Organic Agriculture of Wageningen UR).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Organization} PRI: Plant Research International of Wageningen UR. Organization Leader(s): Blom-Zandstra, dr.ir. M. (Greet).
